meanings.definition: To represent or symbolize with an emblem.
meanings.sent1: The shield emblemed courage and strength.
meanings.sent2: She emblemed her loyalty with a heart-shaped badge.
meanings.sent3: The cat emblemed its territory with tiny paw prints.
meanings.sent4: His smile emblemed joy and happiness to all who saw him.
meanings.sent5: The flag emblemed unity and pride for the nation.

meanings.definition: Having an emblem or emblematic design.
meanings.sent1: The emblemed shield displayed the family crest.
meanings.sent2: She wore a necklace with an emblemed pendant.
meanings.sent3: The emblemed car caught everyone's attention on the street.
meanings.sent4: His emblemed jacket stood out in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The emblemed banner fluttered in the wind, catching the sunlight.

meanings.definition: To decorate or distinguish with an emblem.
meanings.sent1: He emblemed his notebook with colorful stickers.
meanings.sent2: The emblemed trophy gleamed under the spotlight.
meanings.sent3: She emblemed her backpack with her favorite cartoon characters.
meanings.sent4: The emblemed door knocker added a touch of elegance to the entrance.
meanings.sent5: The emblemed ring sparkled on her finger, catching the eye of many.
